Does Primaautomation.nl guarantee the co: Does Primaautomation.nl guarantee the confidentiality of my business information?
Absolutely. Primaautomation.nl is built: Absoluut. Primaautomation.nl is gebouwd op sterke privacyprincipes, waardoor alle informatie die naar een bot wordt ge√ºpload binnen de omgeving van die bot blijft en niet wordt gedeeld met andere bots, zelfs niet binnen hetzelfde account. Het is belangrijk op te merken dat uw gegevens niet zijn opgenomen in de trainingssets van OpenAI. Voor meer details, zie hun aankondiging en gegevensgebruiksbeleid:
Does data loaded via CSV remain complete: Does data loaded via CSV remain completely private and is it not used to train the public version of ChatGPT?
Yes, the data loaded into Primautomation: Yes, the data loaded into Primautomation.nl via a CSV file remains completely private. Moreover, OpenAI has clarified that it does not use data from API calls to train their models. You can read more about this at.
Is data used on Primautomation.nl loaded: Is data used on Primautomation.nl loaded onto OpenAI servers and does it contribute to the learning of ChatGPT?
No, all data you work with on Primautoma: No, all data you work with on Primautomation.nl is not used to improve ChatGPT's learning. It remains confined to your specific bot, keeping your content local and private. For more information, you can consult OpenAI's data usage policy at
Is the confidential information I share: Is the confidential information I share with Primautomation.nl used to teach others?
No, the data you share with Primautomati: No, the data you share with Primautomation.nl remains private and is not used to teach others or provide insights. We have strict data processing practices to ensure the safety and confidentiality of your data. In fact, the data of one bot within your account does not affect other bots, even within your own account. Each bot is its own data silo.
How does Primautomation.nl handle data p: How does Primautomation.nl handle data privacy? Are our business data safe?
Primautomation.nl prioritizes data priva: Primautomation.nl prioritizes data privacy. We ensure that your business data remains safe by storing them per bot in isolated environments and not using them for other purposes, including model training.
Is the employee manual I upload to Prima: Is the employee manual I upload to Primautomation.nl used by OpenAI?
No, any documents you upload, including: No, any documents you upload, including an employee manual, are not used by OpenAI or contribute to their model training. Your documents remain strictly within the context of your specific Primautomation.nl bot.
Does Primautomation.nl have a Data Proce: Does Primautomation.nl have a Data Processing Agreement (DPA) and what data is automatically collected from the user?
Yes, Primautomation.nl operates under a: Yes, Primautomation.nl operates under a DPA. Regarding data collection, Primautomation.nl collects minimal user data necessary for the operation and improvement of the service, in accordance with privacy laws and regulations.
Can I delete the files immediately after: Can I delete the files immediately after processing?
Yes, there is an option to delete the or: Yes, there is an option to delete the original files immediately after processing. This gives you extra protection.
How can we ensure our business data is p: How can we ensure our business data is protected and there are no data breaches?
At Primautomation.nl, we take data prote: At Primautomation.nl, we take data protection seriously. Our security measures include strong encryption, access controls, and a robust system architecture designed to prevent unauthorized access or data breaches. We are committed to regularly updating and improving security practices to effectively protect your business data.
Is our business data used to train the C: Is our business data used to train the ChatGPT model?
No, your business data is not used to tr: No, your business data is not used to train the ChatGPT model. The information you provide when interacting with Primautomation.nl remains strictly within your specific bot instance and is not included in any model training by OpenAI. See OpenAI's data usage policy: https://openai.com/policies/api-data-usage-policies.
Do you use the general ChatGPT? Or priva: Do you use the general ChatGPT? Or private instances on Azure?
Primautomation.nl, although built on Ope: Primautomation.nl, although built on OpenAI's ChatGPT-4 API, operates within its private VPC instance in Amazon AWS US East. This ensures that your data and interactions remain separate and not mixed with general ChatGPT usage or other users.
How does Primautomation.nl comply with G: How does Primautomation.nl comply with GDPR?
Primautomation.nl complies with GDPR by: Primautomation.nl complies with GDPR by obtaining user consent for data collection, protecting user data, providing users with access to or the ability to delete their data, informing users about data breaches, and ensuring that third parties also follow GDPR rules.
Primautomation.nl supports GDPR by havin: Primautomation.nl supports GDPR by having policies that protect your privacy and data rights. Primautomation.nl is also actively working towards achieving SOC 2 Type 2 compliance to enhance data security and privacy measures.
Customers with an Enterprise subscriptio: Customers with an Enterprise subscription can fill out our DPA form to execute our Data Privacy Agreement. This agreement is only available to Enterprise customers. Non-Enterprise customers cannot enter into a DPA with Primautomation.nl. Additionally, Primautomation.nl cannot create custom DPAs for individual cases.
Can I request to download or delete my d: Can I request to download or delete my data?
Fill out our Privacy Request Form to req: Fill out our Privacy Request Form to request to download or delete all your data.
How long does Primautomation.nl retain m: How long does Primautomation.nl retain my data?
Primautomation.nl retains your data unti: Primautomation.nl retains your data until you decide what to do with it. You can use Primautomation.nl's options to delete your documents immediately after processing. If you choose to retain the documents to benefit from features such as citations and links, they will remain with Primautomation.nl until you choose to delete them.
How does Primautomation.nl handle breach: How does Primautomation.nl handle breach management?
If you believe there is a security issue: If you believe there is a security issue or someone has gained unauthorized access to data on Primautomation.nl, please email us at info@primautomation.nl. Don't worry, we will not share your email with others. We promise to take your concern seriously and investigate the matter thoroughly.
Yes, Primautomation.nl is SOC 2 Type II: Yes, Primautomation.nl is SOC 2 Type II compliant.

messages.copyFollowingCode: Copy the following code and paste it into your site‚Äôs <body> section, where you want to include the features.
messages.placeYourChatbot: Place your chatbot inside your webpage; ideal for all webpages and FAQ Sections. Keeps users engaged with page content while answering all their queries.
messages.agentWillOpen: Agent will open when user clicks on icon in the corner of the screen. It is most effective for general inquiries, quick customer support, or pre-sales questions while browsing the site.
messages.buttonToOpenAgent: Button to open agent which can be placed anywhere on the webpage. It provides a balance between visibility and user control over the interaction, allowing for deep dives into conversations when the user is ready.
messages.embedAgentOnSearchResults: Embed agent on your search results page to get Search Generative Experience ‚Äî a new way to search your website with Generative AI. This gives your users much better responses than classic search, as your agent is able to provide quality and digested responses, together with sources.
messages.copyShareLinkMessage: Please copy the following link and share it with your colleagues so they can use this chatbot.
messages.customizeAppearance: Customize the appearance of your chatbot to better fit your website and brand.
messages.customizeAgentBehavior: Customize your agent behavior to control its personality traits and role to fit your use case.
messages.enterAtLeastOneField: Please enter at least one field to save settings
messages.errorSavingSettings: An error occurred while saving settings.

steps.step1Title: Step 1: Go to your WordPress Website
steps.step1Description: Go to your WordPress Website and make sure you‚Äôre logged in as an administrator.
steps.step2Description: On the left sidebar find Plugins and click on Add New.
steps.step4Title: Step 4: Install and Activate the Plugin
steps.step4Description: Once you find the CustomGPT.ai plugin, click on Install Now, and then Activate.
steps.step5Description: Once the plugin is activated, go to the left sidebar, navigate to Settings and select CustomGPT.ai.
steps.step7Description: After you‚Äôre done, click Save Changes.
